00020 
00025 int String2Int(const std::string& str)
00026 {
00027         int result = 0;
00028     std::string::const_iterator i = str.begin();
00029 
00030     if (i == str.end())
00031         return -999;
00032 
00033     bool negative = false;
00034 
00035     if (*i == '-')
00036     {
00037         negative = true;
00038         ++i;
00039 
00040         if (i == str.end())
00041             return -999;;
00042     }
00043 
00044     result = 0;
00045 
00046     for (; i != str.end(); ++i)
00047     {
00048         if (*i < '0' || *i > '9')
00049             return -999;;
00050 
00051         result *= 10;
00052         result += *i - '0';
00053     }
00054 
00055     if (negative)
00056     {
00057         result = -result;
00058     }
00059 
00060     return result;
00061 }

00100 void superkalkulator::Save(){
00101    ofstream outfile;
00102    outfile.open("Log.txt",ios::app);
00103    for(int i = 0;i<=Log.getTopStack()-1;i++)
00104    {
00105                 outfile << Log.getData(i) << endl;
00106    }
00107    outfile.close();
00108    cout<<"Save success"<<endl;
00109 }

00273 void superkalkulator::Undo(int n){
00274         string out;
00275         if(n <= Log.getDataCount())
00276         {
00277                 int temp = Log.getDataCount();
00278                 for(int i = temp - n;i<=temp-1;i++)
00279                 {
00280                         cout<<"Pushed : "<<Log.getData(i)<<endl;
00281                         this->Log>>out;
00282                 }
00283         }
00284         else
00285         {
00286                 cout<<"Penghapusan gagal"<<endl;
00287         }
00288 
00289 }

00295 void superkalkulator::Redo(int n){
00296         if(n <= Log.getDataCount())
00297         {
00298                 int temp = Log.getDataCount();
00299                 for(int i = temp - n;i<=temp-1;i++)
00300                 {
00301                         this->Input(Log.getData(i));
00302                 }
00303         }
00304         else
00305         {
00306                 cout<<"Jumlah log lebih kecil dari yang diminta"<<endl;
00307         }
00308 
00309 }

00363 int superkalkulator::CheckEkspresiType(string ekspresi)
00364 {
00365         int mode;
00366         string tempekspresi = ekspresi;
00367         int Exit = 0;
00368         int ArabnLogika = 0;
00369         while(tempekspresi.length() != 0 && Exit==0)
00370         {
00371                 if(tempekspresi[0] == '~' || tempekspresi[0] == '&' || tempekspresi[0] == '|')
00372                 {
00373                         mode = 2;
00374                         Exit = 1;
00375                 }
00376                 else if(tempekspresi[0] == 'M' || tempekspresi[0] == 'D' || tempekspresi[0] == 'C' || tempekspresi[0] == 'L' || tempekspresi[0] == 'X'|| tempekspresi[0] == 'V'|| tempekspresi[0] == 'I')
00377                 {
00378                         mode = 3;
00379                         Exit = 1;
00380                 }
00381                 else if(tempekspresi[0] == '+' || tempekspresi[0] == '-' || tempekspresi[0] == '*' || tempekspresi[0] == ':' || tempekspresi[0] == '/' || tempekspresi[0] == '%')
00382                 {
00383                         mode = 1;
00384                         Exit = 1;
00385                 }
00386                 else if(tempekspresi[0] == '0' || tempekspresi[0] == '1')
00387                 {
00388                         if(tempekspresi.length() > 1)
00389                         {
00390                                 if(tempekspresi[1] == '0' || tempekspresi[1] == '1')
00391                                 {
00392                                         mode = 1;
00393                                 }
00394                                 else
00395                                 {
00396                                         mode = 0;
00397                                 }
00398                         }
00399                         else
00400                         {
00401                                 mode = 0;
00402                         }
00403                 }
00404                 else if( tempekspresi[0] == '2' || tempekspresi[0] == '3' || tempekspresi[0] == '4' || tempekspresi[0] == '5'
00405                         || tempekspresi[0] == '6'|| tempekspresi[0] == '7' || tempekspresi[0] == '8' || tempekspresi[0] == '9')
00406                 {
00407                         mode = 1;
00408                 }
00409                 tempekspresi.erase(0,1);
00410         }
00411         return mode;
00412 }
